job.title: Software Engineer
job.description: <p>Here at Wrap we are a small, but quickly growing team. Our mission is to develop tools to allow for a safe, non-pain compliant method for public safety members to de-escalate situations and get people the help they need. This is an amazing chance to be a part of company that is looking to positively impact the world, while also gaining an incredible range of VR development related experience. </p><p>&nbsp; </p><p>The Software Engineer will work on a cross-functional team to design, develop, debug, and Virtual Reality Training Software for Law Enforcement (Wrap Reality). The Software Developer will interface with other Developers, DevOps Engineers, UX Designers, Artists, and Business Support Staff to build an immersive training environment in Unity. The Wrap Reality software integrates with web services on AWS and will require interfacing with that team to iteratively support their needs. Additionally, Developers will be involved in writing Unit and Regression Tests, participating in Code Reviews, and working with Continuous Integration / Continuous Deployment software and methodologies. </p><p><br> </p> <p><strong>RESPONSIBILITIES</strong> </p> <ul> <li>Develop VR applications to support law enforcement training. </li> <li>Design, implement, test, and debug applications independently and in teams. </li> <li>Develop and maintain documentation. </li> <li>Participate in user research, code reviews and ensure that coding is done according to the best practices. </li> <li>Assist in preparing software requirements and design specifications to develop applications. </li> <li>Conduct and implement performance, unit, and stress testing of applications. </li> <li>Collaborate with other developers, artists and customers to develop quality software products. </li> <li>Assist in defining a project’s scope and objectives. </li> <li>Research and learn new technologies in their area of work. </li> </ul> <p>&nbsp; </p> <p><strong>REQUIREMENTS</strong> </p> <ul> <li>Bachelors Degree in Software Engineering or related field </li> <li>3+ years of experience in software engineering </li> <li>Deep experience building 3D applications in Unity </li> <li>Proficient in object-oriented programming in one of the following; C#, Java, or Python </li> <li>Experience profiling and building within XR technical, optimization, render performance and implementation constraints. </li> <li>Experience creating titles on AR/VR platforms like Hololens, Oculus, HTC Vive, or PlayStation VR. </li> <li>Works effectively with cross-functional teams including engineers, artists and QA. </li> </ul> <br><p>&nbsp;</p>
